topics.body:
The main difference between the B-type and F-type equipment is that the EVA is slower, But it gets power weapons.

Twin progressive daggers, An All Range mastema. (An all purpose weapon that's a Machine gun, A Progressive sword, And an N2 missile launcher all in one.) A Dual saw. (Twin chainsaws) And the shoulders have the Impact Volt. (An electric beam)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
I don't know if anyone cares right now, but I'm confident that Attack on Titan is becoming my second favorite anime of all time, second to Cowboy Bebop. After getting done with the eighth episode, I'm impressed on how so much turned around after everything went to crap. 

And that twist. Boy that's really gonna shake things up.
Honestly I need to get my laptop back in operation so I can gush more about this anime without being restricted to a damn iPhone or using one of the school's computers.

And the animation is still amazing to watch, and the soundtrack is still fantastic and great to listen to
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
